question: My wife put daughters name (Naha) and my father is asking for (Naila) but my wife is not agree with this name she is asking it is not a Islamic name. Please tell meanings of (Naha & Naila)
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

Naila is a noun derived from the verb, 'Naala - yanaalu', which means one
who achieves / acquires.

Naha is a verb which means to prohibit. The noun derived from this verb is
Nahiya. The name Nahiya is more appropriate.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
